name: mochimo
description: Integrate with the Mochimo Cryptocurrency Network

scripts.build:docs: jsdoc2md --template docs/hbs/template --separators docs/hbs/sep --files src/blockchain.js src/tx.js src/node.js src/mochimo.js > docs/README.md
scripts.prepare: npm run test && npm run build:docs && echo "Please update semver in package.json & docs/README.md"
scripts.release: read OTP -p "One-Time-Password:" && npm login && clear && npm publish -otp=$OTP && npm logout
